actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction on the Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claim of the estate of R. Gordon Finney, Jr.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction on the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment in an action upon a particular claim of the estate of a certain individual.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction on the Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claim of the estate of R. Gordon Finney, Jr.
